main event: A strange glowing object was observed hovering in the sky near Memphis, Tennessee in August 1968.
interesting points: The object had red and green lights on its underside and white lights that were revolving on the bottom half.
The object was too slow to be a plane and did not look like a blimp.
The object would leave the area and then come back several times.
The object made no sound when it passed overhead.
The sighting was reported to the Student's office at the Lausanne School in Lausanne, Switzerland.
sighted object: A strange glowing object with lights
witnesses: Civilian, including students and a teacher
